00001 import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms

00003 from Calibration.ALCARAW_RECO.alCaIsolatedElectrons_cfi import *
00004 from Calibration.ALCARAW_RECO.AlCaElectronTracksReducer_cfi import *

00006 
00007 from RecoJets.Configuration.RecoPFJets_cff import kt6PFJets
00008 kt6PFJetsForRhoCorrection = kt6PFJets.clone(doRhoFastjet = True)
00009 kt6PFJetsForRhoCorrection.Rho_EtaMax = cms.double(2.5)
00010 
00011 alcarecoEcalRecHitReducerSeq = cms.Sequence(alCaIsolatedElectrons)
00012 alcarecoElectronTracksReducerSeq = cms.Sequence(alcaElectronTracksReducer)
00013 
00014 # sequence that reduces the RECO format (only ECAL part) into ALCARECO
00015 seqALCARECOEcalCalElectronRECO = cms.Sequence( alCaIsolatedElectrons)
00016 
00017 # sequence that reduces the RECO format (not ECAL part) into ALCARECO
00018 ALCARECOEcalCalElectronPreSeq = cms.Sequence( kt6PFJetsForRhoCorrection +
00019                                               alcaElectronTracksReducer +
00020                                               pfisoALCARECO )
00021 
00022 seqALCARECOEcalCalElectron = cms.Sequence( ALCARECOEcalCalElectronPreSeq +
00023                                            seqALCARECOEcalCalElectronRECO
00024                                            )
